### Added
- Add `ephemeral-storage` requests and limits to satisfy Kyverno policy `require-emptydir-requests-and-limits`.
### Changed
- Enable upstream-provided Prometheus PodMonitor to scrape metrics from Teleport Kube Agent pods.
